successes.title: Thursday Boot Co. - THURSDAY | EVERYDAY
successes.description: Durable and sophisticated boots that are perfect for work and play.

Pledges.description: [EARLY SUPPORTERS]: ONE pair of our premium handcrafted Thursday Boots. ANY STYLE. ANY COLOR. See the Timing & Process section for style/color/size selection.
ONE pair of our premium handcrafted Thursday Boots at our special Kickstarter price. ANY STYLE. ANY COLOR. See the Timing & Process section for style/color/size selection.
[EARLY SUPPORTERS]: TWO pairs of our premium handcrafted Thursday Boots. ANY STYLE. ANY COLOR. See the Timing & Process section for style/color/size selection.
TWO pairs of our premium handcrafted Thursday Boots. ANY STYLE. ANY COLOR. See the Timing & Process section for style/color/size selection. You have made a good decision my friend.
[EARLY SUPPORTERS]: THREE pairs of our premium handcrafted Thursday Boots. ANY STYLE. ANY COLOR. See the Timing & Process section for style/color/size selection.

[CUSTOM BOOTS]: Work with the Thursday team to create a limited edition 1/1 pair of boots just for you.  After getting your exact foot measurements, we will supply you with a wide variety of leathers, soles and other materials to build something special.

NINE pairs of premium handcrafted Thursday Boots. What are you thinking? But really - we want to know. So the next time you are in NYC, we would like to take you and a friend out for some Thursday night fun at our favorite bar - The Garret. Transportation not included, drink offer only good for 1 year, must be 21+ to redeem. You are a gentleman and a scholar. Thank you.
